page.title: 04Suggitt's Ice-Cream.
page.content: { The Suggitts}have been making their popular ice-cream since 1925.The present Mr.Suggitt had a relative who made it before him.The Suggitts used to live on High Green in the 1930s and made their ice-cream out in their back garden although they still had their old shop.Mr.Suggitt now lives in a large house by the{River Leven.}Today the shop also sells sweets,and a small cafe' owned by the Suggitts is a popular addition.Suggitts white,creamy ice-cream is sold at quite reasonable prices,and is popular with both villagers and visitors alike.Aswell as the shop in the village,the Suggitts have a van which covers quite a wide area.A visit to Great Ayton,would not be complete without sampling Suggitt's ice-cream. by{Layla Lewis}&{Katren Brown
